Articles.Content:
KerbalWare Mods!

KerbalWare High-Tech Computers

This product contains :

1 High-Tech ASAS Computer

6 Pods with High-Tech Computers

KerbalWare High-Tech ASAS

It's basicly just a computer with ASAS strapped on with duct-tape.

It haves an open close animation, which can be bound to an action group.

(The textures look better in game!)

The pods have a display with information.

I got permission from Snjo to use his plugin.

Mk1 Pod with a KerbalWare High-Tech Computer

Other than that there is the "Mk1-2 Cockpit" "Cupola" "Mk1 Plane Cockpit" "Mk1 Lander Can" "Mk2 Lander Can"

KerbalWare Radial Adapters

This mods includes:

1m Radial Adapter

2m Radial Adapter

Download

KerbalWare High-Tech Computers : http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/kerbalware-high-tech-computers-3/

KerbalWare Radial Adapters : http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/kerbalwareadapters/

Big thanks to Snjo for helping me A LOT!

Edited June 11, 2013 by -Lysdal-

This sounds kinda crazy but do you think you could make the computers look like the IBM ThinkPads? They are the laptops on the ISS and it shouldn't be too hard to just make your current ones black (thats about all that needs to be done.)

Great mod!

This sounds kinda crazy but do you think you could make the computers look like the IBM ThinkPads? They are the laptops on the ISS and it shouldn't be too hard to just make your current ones black (thats about all that needs to be done.)

Great mod!

I will try and do that tomorrow, I need sleep now
I love the models, and especially the 'SPAAAAAAACE'bar but I'm curious whether these are just seperate models, or if they differ in any way to the stock ASAS mechanics.

I love the models, and especially the 'SPAAAAAAACE'bar but I'm curious whether these are just seperate models, or if they differ in any way to the stock ASAS mechanics.

The KerbalWare High-Tech ASAS is just like the normal ASAS, but the Pods with it installed have an information computer.

The KerbalWare High-Tech ASAS can also just be used for cosmetic things...

Edited June 15, 2013 by -Lysdal-

Great mod!

Made it! You can download it in the "Mediafire Black Version" download!

EDIT: The only version you can download is the black version now!

I also removed the extra rotation speed.

It would be cool if they were not just ASAS, Like a programable computer or just with some basic ship commands/eva commands if you grabbed it with KAS (g grab function.)
dont mean to be mean, but do you really want to take windows to space? If you crash your computer, It'll take a round trip to jool and back to kerbin before it restarts. I would go for lynix.
Uh... Are you stupid? It takes 5 seconds to restart windows.

Now all internals (Not the ones that arent finished by squad) implemented!
